name: 薛文景
objective: An understanding of corrosion and its controlled is important for all of the materials students. Studies of the effects of corrosion in society have shown that we need to pay the attention for the occurrence of corrosion and methods of controlling it.
schedule:
1.電極電位，及腐蝕原理中建立學生腐蝕技術，
2.DC極化法，
3.AC阻抗法，
4.ER測試，
5.ERR敏化測試高溫水溶液
6.應力腐蝕測試等，腐蝕壽命評估，材料腐蝕管理系統，核能電廠材料，地下緊密電位量測，水溶液腐蝕抑制效果。
